title: Is it normal that my series count 1 loss as 2?
body:
I'm currently in my series to Gold 5 and realised that when I lose a game it counts as 2?

I have won 2 so far and lost one. (op.gg: https://euw.op.gg/summoner/userName=Veursace )
It seems kinda odd because 1 win equals 1. 

Thanks in advance!

replies.body: I looked into this for you, and it looks like you had a [queue dodge](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751844-Queue-Dodging).  Per the guide, that counts towards a loss during your series.  Sorry about that, but good luck on your next run!
